showerReviews.reviewText: As always, Love's maintains a clean inviting facility that makes it a great place to stop when traveling. ‚Ä¶

Clean and employees are always friendly. You can always find buckets of water and squeegees to clean your windshield, free air in the diesal truck area, propane, clean showers anyone can use, and 2 sets of washers and dryers.  Download the app and get 10 cents off gas.

Nice Loves! Clean store & restrooms, laundry facilities (3 dryers/2 washers). We‚Äôve been having bad luck the last few weeks with the ‚Äúloves‚Äù truck stops so it‚Äôs nice to be back in a clean place for the night( husband is a truck driver). ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Pilot Dealer
locations.content: Pilot Dealer may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: The showers were phenomenal. Loved the space the area of the shower needs to be maybe 6 inches wider for the curtains it caused the floor to flood we wiped it up no big deal. Huge shower room only other thing I'd add is a table or shelf to ‚Ä¶

Cleanliness is something most truck stops disregard. This Pilot is the cleanest Truck Stop I've ever visited. Shower rooms cost $12. They are tiled, very clean & spacious. No rust or scum on fixtures. It also has plenty of parking.
üèÖüèÜüéñ ‚Ä¶

The nicest truck stop shower I have had to date. They accept pilot points for showers. Good food ( a little expensive, but it's a truck stop). Only downside is the angled truck parking. Some people don't know how to back and that just helps ‚Ä¶
When were I go there. There showers are not working. Today I had to w8 more than 3 hours for the shower. I don't know why pilot doing business with them if they don't have a shower.
Waited forever for a shower.   Only 2 are operable.   It's normally a pleasant experience though.   This is a 1st.

Ok First.... You CAN USE YOUR PILOT POINT FOR SHOWERS!! You cant reserve a shower on the Pilot App, but can pay for one once you're inside. The showers are so beautiful and clean. The Store smells so good and the Customer Service was good ‚Ä¶
Super clean place. Good BBQ. They overcharge for frozen drinks. A large icee will set you back over $5. They are marketed as a Pilot yet they do not take Pilot point nor shower credits.
Food choices are amazing,  but the shower was disappointing.  Low water pressure and the shower head faces the width, not the length. Poor design.
Walked in to get a shower and was told no shower due to they don't clean showers on 3rd shift. 3rd shift is the job to have here lol.
Go in to take a shower and was told they didn't have one available till after 6 because they were not cleaned and that was after the cleaning lady came in

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ is paid. The wifi does work in the parking lot, which was a plus as at many other locations it does not. Liquid soap in the showers is a hit and miss. I arrived here a day ago, a few of the pump lanes were tapped off. Capuccino and soda ‚Ä¶

I love this place‚ù£Ô∏èI was able to take a shower, wash my clothes, eat some good food, buy my basic necessities before parking and sleeping in my car for the night, and the staff is very accommodating, so I may never leave... They r hiring ‚Ä¶

Bryan working here is the bestüëç.He understands  truckers too.  9 months I've been off road he welcomed me back on road..the shower was great. Thx again!

mostly paid parking. qt, love's and other stores near by. shower is good. beer is present.
very good track stop.  very nice people.  I really liked it here.  nice and fully working shower.  everything is very clean.  highly recommend this place!
Didn‚Äôt provide ANY towels in the shower‚Ä¶

Wow!  I was pleasantly surprised at how nice their showers are!  I got there at 4:45 pm Thursday evening, swiped my rewards card to use my free shower, and there were several showers available.  I've been stopping at this location for a ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Great place showers are totally different that what im a custom too. This shower was the best thing I've ever used out here on the road. Facility is clean people are friendly and easy going open 24 hrs . Let alone as a driver cheaper than ‚Ä¶
I think it's the exon travel center. I do like it very artsy. clean and with shower.

Clean place and good spot for truckers! Has showers and a good taco place! Honestly the best quesabirria tacos I‚Äôve ever had I think!!üòç and we‚Äôve tried many places! Showers are like $13 and are really updated. Only thing is that there‚Äôs ‚Ä¶
Nice little stop. Paved parking..the Wicked Taco has really good tacos. Large lounge with TV. Shower has 7 heads ( 1 vertical and 6 horizontal  streams of water)

‚Ä¶ shop for sure! You can buy food, desserts, parts for your vehicle, anything a trucker might need from cb antennae to reflectors, they have a gift shop and the best part is they have showers for a very reasonable price! The showers have more ‚Ä¶

Stopped in for a shower and a meal. So nice here, the staff is super friendly, very nice new showers. Had delicious catfish for lunch and met the Boss himself. Will stop here as often as I can. Support this Truckstop!
‚Ä¶ But, I was let down by the quality of the showers. I tried the standard shower and my husband tried the premium shower. ‚Ä¶

all time favourite truck stop
very well maintained and outstanding service
all staff members are nice and friendly.
restroom and shower are luxury. 10 out of 10.
